metadata.title: CVE-2022-26564 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
HotelDruid Hotel Management Software v3.0.3 contains a cross-site scripting(XSS) vulnerability via the prezzoperiodo4 parameter in creaprezzi.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26564` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hoteldruid - 3.0.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hoteldruid package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.4-1').
